attention3.ptxt: For identification of each cylinder and bank, refer to Precaution for Identification of Cylinder and Bank:N32A .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0341: Camshaft Position Sensor “A” Circuit Range/Performance Bank 1 or Single Sensor

entry.ptxt: Abnormal CMP sensor signal (bank 1 / intake side) is detected more than specified times.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

ptxt.emph: P0346: Camshaft Position Sensor “A” Circuit Range/Performance Bank 2

entry.ptxt: Abnormal CMP sensor signal (bank 2 / intake side) is detected more than specified times.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

ptxt.emph: P0366: Camshaft Position Sensor “B” Circuit Range/Performance Bank 1

entry.ptxt: Abnormal CMP sensor signal (bank 1 / exhaust side) is detected more than specified times.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

ptxt.emph: P0391: Camshaft Position Sensor “B” Circuit Range/Performance Bank 2

entry.ptxt: Abnormal CMP sensor signal (bank 2 / exhaust side) is detected more than specified times.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

s1.ptxt: Run engine at idle speed for 1 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

testgroup.title: CMP sensor, signal rotor and CMP sensor circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check CMP sensor, signal rotor and CMP sensor circuit related to DTC according to Step 2 through 6 under DTC P0342 / P0343 / P0347 / P0348 / P0367 / P0368 / P0392 / P0393:N32A .

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

testgroup.title: CKP sensor, signal rotor and CKP sensor circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check CKP sensor, signal rotor and CKP sensor circuit related to DTC according to Step 2 through 7 under DTC P0335 / P0336:N32A .

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
